description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
name: Suspicious Curl Usage on Windows
query: ((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR Product:"The\ curl\ executable") AND process.command_line:*\ \-O\ *)
